mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_name, member_email, member_password) VALUES (#{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword})
mapper.select: SELECT m.mission_title, m.mission_explain FROM mission AS m WHERE m.challenge_no = 1 AND m.mission_no NOT IN ( SELECT c.mission_no FROM member AS mem INNER JOIN complete AS c ON mem.member_no = c.member_no WHERE mem.member_id = #{memberId}::UUID )
